ygData.subject: Re: Pox on....
ygData.msgSnippet: Not to nitpick, but....well ok I m nitpicking.... The guy who had the good stuff was level 22.  = ) And who s to say he didn t hunt mammoths till the cows came
ygData.messageBody:
Not to nitpick, but....well ok I'm nitpicking....

The guy who had the good stuff was level 22. = )

And who's to say he didn't hunt mammoths till the cows came home, then
bought all that stuff? = )

Dornn

>
>black perls, serpentin bracers and da execushoners hud.....and only 17.
>Man that makes me mad....i canna stand monks or any class for dat mater
>that *burp* that be waring stuff they canna earn on thay own *hic* Pox on
>yu.
>
>Sligo
>Cazic Thule
